attributes.action: To make mental health medication free to people not on benefits.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to make Mental health medication free to people not on benefits, I think this will help with the mental health of people in this country.
attributes.background: I want the Government to make Mental health medication free to people not on benefits, I think this will help with the mental health of people in this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618679
